Thank you for the bug report.
Do you have a particular build file that will trigger this problem?

I am not able to reproduce this. 
I thought the stack trace would give you some clue.

I think it happens while editing an ant file. If the file is left in an invalid
state (arbitrary missing sections) the parser gets confused. I was moving blocks
of xml around when it happened. 

Do you think we should close this till it happens again ?
Please reopen when more details are available. Thanks.
